title: sCIP#36 Add CRV/sCRV Pool
body:
Proposing to add a CRV/sCRV pool that will allow users to trade slippage free using the Curve x Synthetix trading route into and from CRV.
Further details and discussion here: https://gov.curve.fi/t/scip-36-add-crv-scrv-pool/1651
author: 0x6B507494b0f9D86a85A393Df90884a39A974bC64
